titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the University of Pittsburgh Women's Studies Program Records, 1970-2005 UA.15.26
titlestmt.author: Kallie Sheets.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-06-11 10:07:46 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: University of Pittsburgh, Women's Studies Program Records
did.abstract: The Women's Studies program at the University of Pittsburgh began in 1972 after notable unrest regarding social situations in Pittsburgh and the nation. The program has evolved over the years to aim in educating students about the social issues they currently face. This collection documents the development and administration of the Women's Studies Program though departmental and curriculum records.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This collection documents the development and administration of the Women's Studies Program at the University of Pittsburgh. It contains information regarding the curriculum of the program, conferences and activism, and committees created by those within the program. Additionally, it contains news articles about the program, and information about the Women's Studies Collection of grassroots publications previously held at Hillman Library.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Women's Studies program was created at the University of Pittsburgh in 1972. Over time, the interdisciplinary program reached a point where students were able to earn a major, minor, or certificate in women's studies. In 2013 the Women's Studies Program proposed a name change to the Gender, Sexuality and Women's Studies Program, and in 2015 this name change was officially approved by the University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Pittsburgh Women's Studies Program Records, 1970-2005, University Archives, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Deposited in several accessions from the Women's Studies Program beginning in 1997.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Kallie Sheets in May 2017.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series includes information about the creation and development of the Women's Studies Program. It includes reports, proposals and planning documents outlining the formation and changes that occurred within the program.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series includes the meeting minutes and agenda of the Women's Studies Steering Committee dating from the creation of the program in 1972 and through 2000.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series contains publications created by the Women's Studies Program. It includes the monthly newsletters, In The News, and Synthesis.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subseries includes the Monthly Newsletters published by the Women's Studies Program from 1981 to 1996, as well as samples of earlier announcements and newsletters pertaining to the program.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subseries includes the publication from the Women's Studies Program called In the News from 1996 to 2005.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subseries includes the paper publication from the Women's Studies Program called Synthesis. This publication reported on women's issues and this subseries includes volumes from 1973 to 1988.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series includes descriptions of the courses that have been offered through the women's studies program. It contains course listings, course proposals and course syllabi from the creation of the program to the 1990s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subseries includes lists of all the courses that were offered through the Women's Studies Program from 1973 to 1997. They are arranged by academic year.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subseries includes correspondence about classes that were being offered, as well as discussions on the creation of new classes and the expansion of the program. It also includes the formal proposals for classes that were offered as part of the program. These materials are arranged by department in which the course would be administered.

did.unittitle: Graduate School of Public and International Affairs

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subseries includes the course syllabi for classes that were offered through the Women's Studies Program. Many include versions of syllabi that have changed through the years, as well as creation of new syllabi for classes. These materials are arranged by department.

did.unittitle: Course Syllabi Health, Physical Recreation Education

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series includes information about events and programs that were hosted by the Women's Studies Program. It contains fliers and lists of annual programming, as well as information about specific lectures.

did.unittitle: Women's Studies Annual Prize Competition Flyers
"The Women's Suffrage Movement: Words and Deeds" Exhibit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series contains information about participation in activist events by those in the Women's Studies Program. It includes information about several marches and rallies attended by members of the program.

did.unittitle: March for Equality/March for Women's Lives

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series includes information and fliers about conferences regarding women's studies topics. Records pertain to conferences held by the university and others in the surrounding area, as well as throughout the country.

did.unittitle: Annual Meeting of the Psychological Association, "Team Teaching the Psychology of Women"

Feminist Ethics and Social Policy Conference

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series contains information about organizations created by women at the University of Pittsburgh. These include committees and organizations created by the Women's Studies faculty.

did.unittitle: Provost Advisory Committee on Women's Concerns

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series includes news clippings regarding the Women's Studies Program and women's issues.

did.unittitle: Copies of Women's Studies News Articles
Copies of Women's Studies News Articles
Copies of Women's Studies News Articles
Women's Studies Announcements in the University Times

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series contains information gathered regarding several national organizations of women, as well as articles on women in several areas of society.

did.unittitle: Hillary Clinton Letter on the United Nations, Women's Conference One Year Later
National Council for Research on Women
Pittsburgh Gay and Lesbian Community Center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series includes information on the creation and efforts to devolop the Womens Studies Collection at Hillman Library.
